title: How to Determine Your Hardiness Zone

steps.headline: Know that there are multiple definitions of what your zone might be.
steps.description:
Make sure to check them all. USDA Plant Hardiness Zone Map
Hardiness zones differ around the world. Sunset zones are slightly different than the USDA zones.

steps.headline: Know about what your average dates of the late spring frost are.
Do a search on the Internet.
Learn about micro-climates.
steps.description: Your front yard and your backyard could be two different zones.

text:
Know that there are multiple definitions of what your zone might be. Make sure to check them all. USDA Plant Hardiness Zone Map
Hardiness zones differ around the world. Sunset zones are slightly different than the USDA zones. Know about what your average dates of the late spring frost are.  Do a search on the Internet.  Learn about micro-climates. Your front yard and your backyard could be two different zones.
